definition: unreal/illusory/imaginary/vague and with nothing in it
emptiness/void/abstract theory or guiding principles/empty or unoccupied/diffident or timid/false/humble or modest/(of health) weak/virtual/in vain

sentences.english: But this kind of understanding is the establishment above the illusory network.
sentences.chinese: 但是这种理解是建立在虚无缥缈的网络之上的。

sentences.english: Then he heard a sacred mountain in the sea.
sentences.chinese: 忽闻海上有仙山，山在虚无缥缈间。

definition: mystery within a mystery/the mysteries of the Dao according to Laozi 老子[Lao3 zi3]
unattainable/far-fetched/out of reach/exceedingly remote or distant
pavilion in the air (idiom); unrealistic Utopian construction/castles in Spain/imaginary future plans
to stand aloof/to be detached from/to transcend worldliness/untrammeled/unconventional
in sight but unattainable (idiom)/inaccessible/also written 可望而不可及[ke3 wang4 er2 bu4 ke3 ji2]
pinyin: ke3 wang4 er2 bu4 ke3 ji2

definition: (of dreams, hopes etc) to vanish/to evaporate/(of a person) to become disillusioned/disillusionment
